name: F-Zero Final
overview: F-Zero Final reworks the league and track loading functions of F-Zero to allow for additional tracks and leagues to be loaded. By appending the BS F-Zero Grand Prix 2 rom to F-Zero, Ace league has become available for the first time. In addition the Grand Prix 2 vehicles have been added to the roster allowing for the selection of all 8 original hover cars! A custom league selection menu was created to allow ace league to be selected. Practice mode has also been enhanced to allow for all 20 maps to be selected.
